name: Select
description: Dropdown/select control with popup menus, grouped items, and keyboard navigation.

use: you need a flexible dropdown with custom items.
you want single or multi-select support.
avoid: options are very long lists without search.

theming: `SelectTheme` controls padding, typography, and popup styling.
accessibility: Provide readable labels and keyboard navigation.
do: Use `SelectGroup` to organize large option sets.
dont: Allow multi-select without clear selected state UI.
